text: @PIBHomeAffairs @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @CimGOI @MIB_India @COVIDNewsByMIB @PIB_India @DDNewslive @airnewsalerts What are you doing by taking this decision? Here in Munirka, South West Delhi from yesterday the new cases started coming. So, what is this step for, just to make it community spread and waste all efforts taken till now? @PIBHomeAffairs @PIB_India @PMOIndia @narendramodi #covid19
